Package server

Class Logic

java.lang.Object
server.Logic
public class Logic extends Object
The Logic class contains the core business logic for handling various operations such as user login, notifications, subscriber management, book management, and report generation.

  • Method Details

    • userLogin

      public static void userLogin(String user, int userId, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Handles user login by fetching user information from the database and sending it to the client.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      userId - the user ID
      client - the client connection

    • fetchNotifications

      public static void fetchNotifications(String user, Object data, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Fetches new notifications for a user and sends them to the client.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      data - the user ID
      client - the client connection

    • newSubscriber

      public static void newSubscriber(String user, Object newSubscriber, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Adds a new subscriber to the database and sends the generated ID to the client.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      newSubscriber - the new subscriber object
      client - the client connection

    • specificSubscriber

      public static void specificSubscriber(String user, int subscriberId, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Fetches a specific subscriber by ID and sends the subscriber details to the client.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      subscriberId - the subscriber ID
      client - the client connection

    • updateSubscriberDetails

      public static void updateSubscriberDetails(String user, Object data, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Updates subscriber details such as phone number and email. Sends a success message if the subscriber is updated, or an error message if the subscriber is not found. Data is in the format "subscriberId:phoneNumber:email".
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      data - the subscriber details in the format "subscriberId:phoneNumber:email"
      client - the client connection

    • reactivateSubscriber

      public static void reactivateSubscriber(String user, Object data, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Reactivates a subscriber account. Sends a success message if the subscriber is reactivated, or an error message if the subscriber is not found.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      data - the subscriber ID and librarian name in the format "subscriberId:librarianName"
      client - the client connection

    • showSubscribersTable

      public static void showSubscribersTable(String user, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Fetches and sends the list of all subscribers to the client.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      client - the client connection

    • sendDataLogs

      public static void sendDataLogs(String user, int sub_id, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Fetches and sends the data logs for a specific subscriber to the client.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      sub_id - the subscriber ID
      client - the client connection

    • sendUserBorrows

      public static void sendUserBorrows(String user, Object data, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Fetches and sends the list of borrow records for a specific subscriber to the client. Borrow records are in type BorrowRecordDTO
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      data - the subscriber ID
      client - the client connection

    • sendUserOrders

      public static void sendUserOrders(String user, Object data, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Fetches and sends the list of order records for a specific subscriber to the client. Order records are in type OrderRecordDTO
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      data - the subscriber ID
      client - the client connection

    • sendSearchedBooks

      public static void sendSearchedBooks(String user, Object data, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Searches for books based on the given criteria and sends the results to the client. Sends the list of books found in the search.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      data - the search criteria in the format "searchType:searchText"
      client - the client connection

    • newBorrow

      public static void newBorrow(String user, Object newborrow, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Adds a new borrowing record to the database and sends the status to the client.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      newborrow - the new borrowing record object
      client - the client connection

    • returnLostBook

      public static void returnLostBook(String user, Object data, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Processes the return of a lost book and sends the status to the client.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      data - the return details in the format "subscriberId:copyId:returnDate"
      client - the client connection

    • returnBook

      public static void returnBook(String user, Object data, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Processes the return of a book and sends the status to the client.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      data - the return details in the format "subscriberId:copyId:returnDate"
      client - the client connection

    • lostBook

      public static void lostBook(String user, Object data, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Marks a book as lost and sends the status to the client.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      data - the borrowing record ID
      client - the client connection

    • newOrder

      public static void newOrder(String user, Object newOrder, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Adds a new order for a book and sends the status to the client.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      newOrder - the new order details in the format "bookId:subscriberId"
      client - the client connection

    • cancelOrder

      public static void cancelOrder(String user, Object order, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Cancels an order and sends the status to the client.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      order - the order ID
      client - the client connection

    • checkOrder

      public static void checkOrder(String user, Object data, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Checks an order and processes an extension if no other orders exist for the book.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      data - the order details in the format "subscriberId:borrowId:extensionDate:librarianName"
      client - the client connection

    • scan

      public static void scan(String user, String msg, int unparsedId, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Scans a book copy or subscriber and sends the details to the client.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      msg - the scan message
      unparsedId - the unparsed ID
      client - the client connection

    • generateMonthlyReports

      public static void generateMonthlyReports(LocalDate reportDate)
      Generates monthly reports for a given date.
      Parameters:
      reportDate - the date for which to generate the reports

    • fetchMonthlyReports

      public static void fetchMonthlyReports(String user, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Fetches monthly reports for a given user and sends them to the client.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      client - the client connection

    • connect

      public static void connect(String user, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Prints a message to the client.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      message - the message to print
      client - the client connection

    • disconnect

      public static void disconnect(String user, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Prints a message to the client.
      Parameters:
      user - the user type (e.g., "subscriber", "librarian")
      message - the message to print
      client - the client connection
